definition: Jingzhe or Insects Wake, 3rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-20th March
Waking from Hibernation/old variant of 驚蟄|惊蛰[Jing1 zhe2], Insects Wake, 3rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气[er4 shi2 si4 jie2 qi5] 6th-20th March

sentences.english: Six little black boys playing with a hive, A bumble-bee stung one, and then there were five.
sentences.chinese: 六個小黑人玩蜂巢，一個被蜜蜂蟄了就還剩下了五個。

sentences.english: But you might run into some jellyfish or Portuguese man-of-wars.
sentences.chinese: 但是你可能碰上海蟄或者僧帽水母。

sentences.english: Shawn was stung by the bee and his face is swollen.
The ant gets its name form the burning sensation caused by its sting.
sentences.chinese: 螞蟻因爲其蟄刺蟄到人後火辣辣的感覺而得名。

sentences.english: In most jellyfish, these stinging cells are so small that they can't penetrate human skin.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數海蜇中，這些蟄刺細胞非常小，以至於無法。

sentences.english: All over the world shaking is thunder.
But Zou said the stings are not as bad as people think.
sentences.chinese: 但是鄒明輝覺得，被蜜蜂蟄也不一定像想象的那麼糟。

sentences.english: If you are stung, splash the area with water and don't rub.
sentences.chinese: 如果被蟄，用水沖洗傷處，不要揉搓。

definition: oriole or various birds of the Sylvidae family including warblers
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic
to fall/meteor/to perish/see also 殞|殒[yun3]
